languages.text: All Navigator powers now have a chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}. Their basic critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} is equal to <u>(Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} / 2)</u>%.
languages.original_text: Теперь у всех сил навигатора появляется {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанс критического попадания{/g}. Его базовое значение равно <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} навигатора / 2)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: All Navigator powers now have a chance to score a critical hit. Their basic critical hit chance is equal to <u>(Navigator's PER)/2</u>%.

languages.text: Todos los poderes de navegante tienen una probabilidad de causar un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}. languages.text: Alle Navigatorkräfte haben jetzt eine Chance, einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} zu erzielen. Die grundlegende kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} entspricht <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g} des Navigators / 2)</u> %.

languages.text: Tous les pouvoirs du navigateur ont désormais une chance d'infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}. languages.text: すべての航宙士の力が{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}するようになる。基本{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}クリティカル率{/g}は<u>(航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} / 2)</u>%となる。

languages.text: Tüm Rotacı güçlerinin artık {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} yapma olasılığı bulunur. Temel kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılıkları{/g}, %<u>(Rotacı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ALG{/g} / 2)</u> değerine eşittir.
